description:
A new pack featuring 10 arranged songs, navigators, and avatars from WACCA & HARDCORE TANO*C! 

A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 arranged songs, navigators, and avatars from WACCA & HARDCORE TANO*C!

This pack includes the following content.
■Songs Pack (10 songs)
・Let you DIVE! / HARDCORE TANO*C & Erizabeth（CV:Saori Onishi）
・Gate One / aran
・Poseidon / Massive New Krew
・Knight Rider / USAO
・with U / t+pazolite & Massive New Krew feat. Lily(CV:Shiki Aoki)
・Ever Free / Massive New Krew
・Sound Chimera / Laur
・Shiny Memory feat. Yukacco / USAO & DJ Genki
・RAV#GIRL / Srav3R
・???(Secret)

■Navigators
・ELIZABETH *with voice
・LILY *with voice

■Avatars
・ELIZABETH(2D)
・LILY(2D)
・REDALiCE(2D)
・t+pazolite(2D)
・Massive New Krew(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.
name: WACCA + HARDCORE TANO*C Pack
